column2: My servants apparently lost track of [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName] today, and it took hours to locate [child_of_destiny.GetHerHim]! column2: The key fits the lock, and trembling with anticipation you slowly open the chest. It is filled with ancient gold coins, carved with the likeness of the long-dead Emperors of Netheril and words written in their strange language!
